page.title: 18RECREATION
page.content: The person at the top then shouts out his word and the person at the other end with the same flower runs up to the top and shouts:"Polo!" {Chain Game When we play Chain game,two poeple hold hands and have to run about trying to touch other people without breaking the chain.The one caught has to join the chain, and so on. {5/10} Somebody stands touching a wall. He or she has to touch other people, then they do the same until everybody has been caught.The Infants play many games including 'Creep mouse','Mr Fisherman','Horses' and ' Oranges & Lemons'.Sometimes the Juniors play too.In school we play Football, Rounders, Netball and Athletics. By Marie Bartlett.
